column4: Hello -- I have something that is going to sound stupid..  I have two of the same notebook computers.  One runs XP and the other Ubuntu 9.10.. For some reason the one running ubuntu 9.10 gets a low wireless signal.   I thought maybe it was hardware so I swapped hard drives between the two (Same exact hardware) and no atter what, the one running XP gets a more reliable wireless signal.
Do you think an OS has anything to do with signal strength though??
check if my notebook turned up?
like if the signal turned up?
although I am unable to help you I am curious to know how it is less reliable?
